Tanks

Class Collisions

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.Collisions

  • public class Collisions
extends java.lang.Object
    The Collisions class manages collision-related logic in the game, such as explosions and damage calculation. It handles interactions between projectiles, tanks, and the terrain.

                  int x,
                  int y,
                  java.lang.String tankSig)
        Constructs a Collisions object.
        Parameters:
        app - The PApplet object.
        x - The x-coordinate of the collision.
        y - The y-coordinate of the collision.
        tankSig - The signature of the tank involved in the collision.

                   int amount)
        Inflicts damage to a tank based on its proximity to the explosion.
        Parameters:
        tank - The tank object to be damaged.
        amount - The amount of damage to be inflicted.

      • getIsExploded

        public static boolean getIsExploded()
        Retrieves the status of the explosion.
        Returns:
        true if an explosion has occurred, false otherwise.
